scripts.build: cd apps/web && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../api && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd apps/api && python -m uvicorn contract_iq.main:app --reload --port 8000" "cd apps/web && npm run dev"
scripts.install-deps: cd apps/web && npm ci && cd ../api && pip install -r requirements.txt
